sourcesContent:
const Multislider = (props) => {

    const { type } = props

    const sliderStyle = {
        position: 'absolute',
        width: '100%',
        height: '5px',
        top: '-7px',
        background: 'none',
        webkitAppearance: 'none',
        mozAppearance: 'none',

        '::mozRangeThumb': {
            height: '15px',
            width: '15px',
            borderRadius: '50%',
            border: '3px solid #1b53c0',
            backgroundColor: '#fff',
            pointerEvents: 'auto',
            mozAppearance: 'none',
        }
    }

    return (
        <>
            <input type='range' min='1' max='100' style={sliderStyle}></input>
            <input type='range' min='1' max='100' style={sliderStyle}></input>
        </>
    )
}

export default Multislider
